title: Ben Roethlisberger out for season, Brees out 6 weeks - Emergency Podcast (Football 9/16)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by Ryan Wilson, John Breech and Sean Wagner-McGough to react to news of Ben Roethlisberger's season-ending injury (1:00) and Drews Brees' injury that will put him out of action for at least 6 weeks (19:00). The guys cover it all including the current and future implications on the careers of these elite yet aging quarterbacks, if the Steelers and Saints can survive, as well as the gambling and fantasy impact of these injuries. 
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
